div1.p: Financial statement. Cost and profit of melting 18,199 pounds of ore.

From the Receipt, Cost and Profit of melting 18199 Pound Mineral, in Mr. Moses Austins furnace, from the 29 of May till the 9 of Jun. 1810 deducted from the worth of lead on 520$80cns keeps profit 224$85 cns. But as is to be paid our only some mineral, Friday, Green, etc. etc. to the Amount of 240$80cnt; so Keeps further back 55$15cnt. what the own Poeple earned. Extracts. mine a Burton the 12 of Jun. 1810.
